code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import filter from'./filter/slice';import games from'./games/slice';import chooseGame from'./chooseGame/slice';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';var store=configureStore({reducer:{games:games,filter:filter,chooseGame:chooseGame}});export var useAppDispatch=function useAppDispatch(){return useDispatch();};export default store;
